name: You are the monster (TheGlassScavenger)
description:
You are the monster is a game made for the 3 hour gamejam "Trijam".

The story of the game goes as follows:

"You are a rogue serial killer inside a killer legion, but you have gone rogue, and you're trying to kill as many members while eventually meeting the legion's boss, you must find him by any means necessary and kill him"

The game was made in Godot with a 3 hour time limit, it took me 2 hours, 37 minutes and 6 seconds to create the game.

Since I have never used Godot before i was unable to finish the game's mechanics, but I will be continueing to work on the game.

All assets made, levels designed and all the programming were done by me.

The game was made by one person in 3 hours
